an6.112:4.3: The view that things are gratifying, the view of self, and wrong view.
an6.112:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.112:4.7: You should develop the perception of impermanence to give up the view that things are gratifying; the perception of not-self to give up the view of self; and right view to give up wrong view.
an6.112:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
